about_the_game:
This demo is the complete Arcade Mode from the full game "3D Don't Die, Mr. Robot!" which will be releasing sometime in 2023.

AIM: - Jump straight into the Neon Dunjun and start surviving!

Mr. Robot has fallen into the forbidden realm of the Neon Dunjun and must stay alive as long as possible. Will you make it to 100%? What happens if you do? Download our demo today and find out!

INSTRUCTIONS - Get the fruit, avoid the enemies, try not to die!

  • Enemies kill Mr. Robot on one touch, so avoid contact with them.
  • Collecting fruit causes an explosion which destroys any enemies who come in contact with it.
  • The goal of the demo is to stay alive as long as possible while scoring as many points as you can.
  • Check your success against others on our leaderboard!

name: 3D Don't Die Mr Robot Demo
short_description: Behold - the demo for 3D Don't Die, Mr. Robot. It's our Arcade Mode in its entirety for you to enjoy and master. What are ya waitin' for? Jump straight into the Neon Dunjun and start surviving!
